      • portTaken

        public static boolean portTaken(int portNumber)
        Checks whether a port is available by attempting to open the supplied port. Currently unused but may be implemented later if problems are encountered with ports being reserved.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - the port number to be checked, supplied as an integer.
        Returns:
        A boolean value expressing the port's availability.

      • validateIP

        public static boolean validateIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Validates a supplied IP against a regular expression representing the IPv4 format.
        Parameters:
        ip - A string that may represent a IPv4.
        Returns:
        True if ip is a valid IPv4, False otherwise.
